thread.title: AMAG raises $800m in debt financing to help fund Cord Blood Registry deal
thread.title_full: AMAG raises $800m in debt financing to help fund Cord Blood Registry deal

title: AMAG raises $800m in debt financing to help fund Cord Blood Registry deal
text:
AMAG raises $800m in debt financing to help fund Cord Blood Registry deal Deal Date: Jun-01-2015 / Deal # 201530513 Executive Summary 
AMAG Pharmaceuticals Inc. (mainly women's health; also anemia and cancer) raised $800mm in debt financing from Jefferies Finance and Barclays Capital. The financing is split between up to a $350mm senior secured term loan and up to $450mm in senior unsecured increasing rate loans. The money will help fund AMAG's concurrent acquisition of Cord Blood Registry Inc. , which banks umbilical cord stem cells, and pay back $320mm in existing debt.
